content: कृतिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कृतमनेन, कृत-इनि] {@--1@} One who has done his work or gained his end, satisfied, contented, happy, successful; यस्य वीर्येण कृतिनो वयं च भुवनानि च <ls>U. 1. 32</ls>; न खल्वनिर्जित्य रघुं कृती भवान् <ls>R. 3. 51</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 64.</ls> {@--2@} (Hence) Lucky, fortunate, blessed; <ls>Ś. 1. 24</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">7. 19.</ls> {@--3@} Clever, competent, able, expert, skilful, wise, learned; तं क्षुरप्रशकलीकृतं कृती <ls>R. 11. 29</ls>, <ls n="R.">19. 14</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 10</ls>; <ls>Ki. 2. 9</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 25</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 2.">30</ls>; <ls>H. 3. 96</ls>; <ls>Ve. 4. 12.</ls> {@--4@} Good, virtuous, pure, pious; तावदेव कृतिनामपि स्फुरत्येष निर्मलविवेकदीपकः <ls>Bh. 1. 56.</ls> {@--5@} Following, obeying, doing what is enjoined.
